    • Uses of DomElement in com.eemi.ext4j.client.core

      Subclasses of DomElement in com.eemi.ext4j.client.core 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ExtElement
      Encapsulates a DOM element, adding simple DOM manipulation facilities, normalizing for browser differences.

    • Uses of DomElement in com.eemi.ext4j.client.ui

      Subclasses of DomElement in com.eemi.ext4j.client.ui 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Layer
      An extended ExtElement object that supports a shadow and shim, constrain to viewport and automatic maintaining of shadow/shim positions.
